video.title: How to stream on YouTube using OBS - in-depth OBS tutorial
video.description:
Learn how to record presentations using OBS and YouTube. Learn how to live stream on YouTube with OBS.

Talk by Joe Matthews at the freeCodeCamp OKC meetup. Thanks to Techlahoma for giving us permission to share.

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: DevSkills
topLevelComment.text: If you be very useful if you can also share the mask image, so that we can apply that without much effort.

topLevelComment.author: Dev Bhojak
topLevelComment.text: freeCodeCamp you are awesome :) watching this in 2020

topLevelComment.author: Damian Montero
topLevelComment.text: Wonderful. he could have skipped the "mask" on spotify with the Alt key. instead of resizing the image it CROPS. Try it with your webcam and any input.

topLevelComment.author: Alex Nezhynsky
topLevelComment.text: Wow Joe, at first I was like, a 1 hour tutorial on OBS, you gotta be kidding me. But then I didn't realize you could do all these things with it. I like your presentation style too! By the way, what's that VS code extension you used for Markdown?

topLevelComment.author: MasteringCode
topLevelComment.text: That's for the great tutorial, I will be definitely adding this to my arsenal to provide better tutorials to the community
